title: Sir Francis Drake reuiued calling vpon this dull or effeminate age, to folowe his noble steps for golde & siluer, by this memorable relation, of the rare occurrances (neuer yet declared to the world) in a third voyage, made by him into the West-Indies, in the yeares 72. & 73. when Nombre de Dios was by him and 52. others only in his company, surprised
note: 1st ed in 1626, 2nd ed in 1628 [extracted in Wright aa part 2], It must be surely recognised that the contemporary Spanish documents herewith published [Wright aa part 1 docs nos 17-28, 30, 31] establish the validity of Sir Francis Drake Revived beyond cavil  /v Wright aa p viii
